title: AFFiNE 0.10.0 - Launch week - Day 3/5: Make Your Mind Flow From Your Doc to Slides, Beautifully
description: Elevate your creative potential with AFFiNE 0.10.0! Discover enhanced whiteboard capabilities, including support for any image on whiteboards, transparent backgrounds, effortless element grouping, and refined presentation styles. Transform your presentations with clarity and elegance today.
